description: This file initializes a knowledge base with CSV data, sets up a vector database, creates an agent, and runs an asynchronous query to retrieve movie genres from the dataset.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from CSV URLs and supports vector search.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and querying vector representations.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads or reloads the knowledge base data.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response based on a query.

calls: asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("What genre of movies are present here?", markdown=True))
